sp.speaker: monica
sp.p: There's nothing to tell! He's just some guy I work with!

sp.speaker: joey
sp.p: C'mon, you're going out with the guy! There's gotta be something wrong with him!

sp.speaker: chandler
sp.p: All right Joey, be nice. So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?

sp.speaker: phoebe
sp.p: Wait, does he eat chalk? They all stare, bemused.
